name: NLconnect
goal: The aim of NLconnect is to promote and defend the Dutch broadband industry's policies and business interests, and to foster co-operation among its members. All members are active parts of the broadband value chain: companies that build and operate broadband networks and companies that provide services on this digital infrastructure as well as their suppliers. We promote innovation, mutual cooperation and knowledge exchange in this sector and promote shared interests among stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Broadband policy, AVMS directive, State Aid, Universal Service, telecoms policy, copyright policy
